stories.text: I said what I said. All the hipster apps that allow you to put stickys on a board to manage progress are missing the point. Tasks to do tasks dont necessarily lead you to accomplishing your goals. I built a tool with my team that makes users align all work to their goals. No way around it. We call them missions. Let me know your thoughts! Roast it, love it, be confused by it...let us know! https://twigflo.com

stories.text:
Hello HN.

I am a somewhat experienced developer and I have five days coming up where I would like to focus on building an income stream.

There is a lot I have on mind but I am sure there is a lot I don't know that I don't know.

What do you suggest I build that I can build in five days that can become an income stream. Did you do something that worked well?
stories.title: Ask HN: Money in Five Days?
